title: Insatiable Boxed Set
description: It’s not cocky when you've got the goods to back it up.  Lust-maker. Pleasure giver. Fantasy creator. I can blow your mind in five seconds flat — but trust me, you’ll want this to last all night.  There’s not a woman in the city who can resist me. Except one. Now she’s got a proposition: Seven days. Every position. No strings attached. She wants to know what she’s been missing.  Who am I to say no?
author: J.D. Hawkins
